aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Committed to Quality and Customer Satisfaction

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description1: With years of experience in bathroom renovations, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality craftsmanship tailored to your needs.
whoWeAre.description2: Our team of experts ensures every project is completed on time and within budget, using only the best materials.
whoWeAre.description3: We would love to know more about your needs, so don't hesitate to contact us.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions or ready to start your project? Contact us today.

gallery.title: Our Work
gallery.subtitle: Explore some of our completed projects and see the quality of our work.

hero.title: Our Process
hero.subtitle: How we ensure a perfect bathroom renovation

1.title: Free Consultation
1.description: Discuss your needs and expectations with our experts.

2.title: Site Visit
2.description: We visit your location to assess the space, equipment, and work required.

3.title: Quotation & Planning
3.description: Receive a detailed quote and plan outlining all steps and timelines.

4.title: Approval
4.description: Review and approve the plan and quotation.

5.title: Installation & Delivery
5.description: Our team executes the project, delivering a fully renovated bathroom.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for all your bathroom renovation needs

1.title: Plumbing
1.description: Expert installation and repair of pipes and fixtures.

2.title: Wall Preparation
2.description: Wall leveling and construction of new walls if needed.

3.title: Tiling
3.description: High-quality tiling services for walls and floors.

4.title: Silicone Application
4.description: Application of silicone for sealing and protection.

6.title: Bathroom Fixtures
6.description: Installation of shower cabins, mirrors, sinks, and cabinets.

7.title: Full Bathroom Renovation
7.description: Complete renovation services from start to finish.
